name: How to Build a Flying City
storyline: Dissatisfied with the taxes the empire is imposing, Miru, the mayor of Tisryle, activates the engines beneath her city and takes to the skies! Not wanting other cities to follow her example, the council that rules the empire immediately sends their armies to destroy Tisryle. Miru must build her forces, recruit new allies, and most importantly, make a whole ton of money if she wants to stand a chance.
summary: When tasked to build a flying city, it's up to you to rake in all the money you'll need! Recruit travelers and adventurers to help your city flourish!
